gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]: Meteoblue data differs from the baseline. Meteoblue shows a slightly higher rain volume (0.1-0.2" vs. baseline not stated). Rest of the data from YR.no and Météo Belgique are not available. It's a bit of a pig in a poke today, so better grab an umbrella just in case.
